home.title: Full Stack web and mobile developer. Angular Expert in the making
home.description: I'm a self-taught developer with proven experience with nodeJS frameworks such Angular, and vue in front-end and express, nestJS in back-end. I'm also a mobile developer with experience in flutter and ionic. I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn new technologies and grow as a developer.

about.title: My Name is Christian Ar√°nguiz. From Lautaro, Chile, developing the next technologies
about.description: With over three years of experience as a Full Stack developer, I have focused on web and mobile development, specialising in the Angular platform. | stand out as a self-taught professional, consistently motivated by new challenges and dedicated to teamwork. My experience includes teaching Angular to interns and trainees, demonstrating my ability to facilitate both personal and team development. | am adept at problem-solving and conflict resolution, aiming to establish a respectful and secure work environment that encourages the expression of opinions and the professional growth of al team members.
